introParagraphOne: Hi! I am a Frontend web developer looking for opportunities to join a work team so I can contribute with my skills and continue learning more about this field.
introParagraphTwo: I took a Fullstack developer bootcamp called 'Henry' where I learned basic programming concepts and the use of technologies for web development (the main stack was: React, Node, Express and PostgreSQL)
introParagraphThree: And I personally continue studying and learning new technologies in a self-taught way.
